Reviews.Content: night debacle holland inn walking past look cleaned 900am short wait shown gentleman owner average london private hotel spacious holland inn staff courteous helpful continental english breakfast free internet lift floors quiet location decent sized ensuite flying 1000pm able leave luggage locked shower changed extra charge departed tube 800pm satisfying experience definitely staying trip london
